name: Beam Em Up
description:
Requirement:  2 players only

CONTROLS

2 Xbox/PS4 Controllers ( Can mix both + mix with keyboard as well)

OR

(Keyboard)

  • Player 1:
    •  AWSD  // Movements
    • Space // Dash
  • Player 2:
    •   Left, Right, Up, and Down  // Movements
    • Enter  // Dash

Credits

  • Sound and music - Ahmed Al-Salman Al Barrak
  • Programmer - Tony Doan
  • Art  and Design - Hasan Al Salman
  • Design and UI -  Ibrahim Al Salman
